description: High Priestress of Odin in Saint Seiya. She is the sovereign of the frozen kingdom of Asgard and she must pray everyday to Odin for him to freeze her realm (as not doing so will tawn the ice in the poles and flood the World). Tragic character enspelled by the Nibelung Ring to do everything that was against her principles and has to watch how all her knights are wasted against Seiya and his friends.
name: Polaris no Hilda
